name: What is a good case of a successful MVP using free, easy, open-source, public resources?
caption: www.quora.com
description: Answer (1 of 2): I think Keynotopia (Amir Khella) is a great example of building a MVP. He started with a blog post, then followed it up with a very simple setup - Wordpress blog + e-Junkie shopping cart (in under 3 hours).   You can read more about how he went around building a profitable busine...
